ol.li: Contains exactly one [1..1] coverageTerm with data type Time Interval
Contains exactly one [1..1] coverageType with data type Code

Contains exactly one [1..1] id with data type Id
Payer-assigned identifier for the Patient.

Contains exactly one [1..1] patientRelationshipCode with data type Code
NCPDP Telcom: Code assigned to a specific person within a family. Examples: 1=Cardholder 2=Spouse 3-999=Dependents and Others (including second spouses, etc.)
Contains exactly one [1..1] patientResidenceType with data type Code

Contains exactly one [1..1] personCode with data type Code
NCPDP Telcom: Code assigned to a specific person within a family. Examples: 1=Cardholder 2=Spouse 3-999=Dependents and Others (including second spouses, etc.)
Contains zero or one [0..1] dependent, where its type is Dependent
Contains exactly one [1..1] patient, where its type is Patient
Contains zero or one [0..1] patientSubscriber, where its type is Patient Subscriber
Contains zero or one [0..1] responsibleParty, where its type is Responsible Party
